content:
I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to start working on your sundress! Remember, it's a process, and it's okay to take your time. You'll learn so much from this project, and it's a great way to improve your sewing skills.

And yay! I'm glad to hear that your sister's quilt turned out well! Three weeks is a great timeframe for a quilt, and I'm sure your sister will appreciate the love and effort you put into making it for her. It's always rewarding to see a project come together, and I'm sure you must feel proud of yourself for completing it.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need any help along the way with your sundress. I'll be here to support you. Good luck, and happy sewing!
